attributes.action: Consider a motion of no confidence in Her Majesty's Government
attributes.additional_details:
The information provided by our government was inadequate and poorly communicated.

We want either a motion of no confidence passed in Her Majesty's Government or
a motion for a general election.
attributes.background: Our government asked British citizens to decide whether to remain as part of the EU. Given the complex nature of this decision,  a mere 4 months was inadequate to allow for our population to equip themselves with the information and knowledge necessary to make an informed decision.
